author: Martin Dayao
comment: It works with Android Wear 2.0 and its so awesome! Seemless and reliable. Great job! Keep it up!

author: Andy Gates
comment: Super useful for tracking a few things
Voice function doesn't function...nothing really to make it stand out from every other counter

author: Adam Hewett
comment: If it can't auto reset by day or week, it is a useless counter.

author: Marco Mendoza
comment: Does as it says. Really well. Is better than other counters and tally's back. Despite have ads that aren't too big, would be great if with a donations can be removed. Great app, deserves 5 stars.

author: Robert Healy
comment: It works well, except the big plus button on the bottom of the screen prevents you from clicking the bottom counter in the list!

reply.author: AppsKPB
reply.content: Thanks for reporting the error. It's already fixed in the new update!

author: Karl Handley
comment: Its a simple counter app but does this task extremely well. Used it for counting number of times anyone swore during EU debate of all things lol. Was a laugh
title: Really good

author: A Google User
comment: I am using this app and this application first of all having the new idea and the other this is it doin like this is said... awesome..
title: This application is the good

author: ishan k
comment: When i M using widget ,its showing app not installed.

reply.author: AppsKPB
reply.content: Is it possible that you have installed the application on the SD card? The widgets of applications installed on the SD do not work. Anything write to kik.59.pb@gmail.com

title: Widget not working
